import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{fetchQuizDataFrombackend}from"../Redux/action.js";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const NewQuizPage=()=>{var _filtertopicwise$;const data=useSelector(state=>state.mernQuize.QuizData);const[count,setCount]=useState(0);const[clickoption,setClickOption]=useState(false);const handleAnswer=(index,e,el)=>{if(clickoption==false){if(el.answer[0][index]===el.correctAnswer){setCount(count+1);}}};// ------taking path from window object and compairing with the backend data
